On 27 Aug 2019, in Barangay M. H. Del Pilar, Pontevedra, Negros Occidental, a police officer from the Public Safety Mobile Force Company shot and wounded a civilian after the victim was mistaken as a relative of suspicious individuals he attacked earlier. A drug suspect was killed during a police raid at Barangay Parulan, Plaridel, Bulacan, on 27 Aug 2019.

During a series of killings in the Negros province, another civilian was stabbed dead by unknown assailants. Her body was found at a sugarcane area in Cauayan City, Negros Occidental on 27 Aug 2019. Investigators are looking at an old grudge as motivation for the killing.
An armed drug suspect killed two men over the allegations of being police informants at San Pablo City, Laguna on 28 Aug 2019.

Two drug suspects and motorcycle thieves were shot dead during a police raid at Barangay 13, Caloocan City, Metro Manila on 31 Aug 2019.

A drug suspect (who was the nephew of the Amante clan patriarch, a former mayor) was shot dead in a vigilante-style attack by unidentified armed men at Barangay Sta. Maria Magdalena, San Pablo City, Laguna on 31 Aug 2019.
On 31 Aug 2019, in Barangay Locus, Sapang Dalaga, Misamis Occidental, a barangay chief was shot dead by unknown assailants.

On 31 Aug 2019, in Barangay Paitan, Escalante City, Negros Occidental, a total of 109 households (329 individuals) evacuated to safer areas following a firefight by the military and the NPAs. As of 3 Sept 2019, the total number of evacuees increased to at around 750 individuals.

A drug suspect was shot dead by alleged armed drug suspects at Barangay Pahanocoy, Bacolod City, Negros Occidental on 31 Aug 2019. He previously confessed to his crimes and named government officials, police officers, media personalities, and businessmen who are allegedly protectors of illegal drugs.
On 31 Aug 2019, in Barangay Poblacion, Pitogo, Zamboanga del Sur, a former town councilor was shot dead by unknown assailants.
On 31 Aug 2019, in Barangay Lipata, Minglanilla, Cebu, a police officer was shot dead by unknown assailants. The suspects were also involved in an earlier shooting that day, with one person wounded.
A drug suspect was shot dead in a vigilante-style attack by an unidentified assailant at Barangay Hagdang Bato Libis, Mandaluyong City, Metro Manila on 31 Aug 2019.
